text: Nombe nao soni achina Adi ni achina Samuda (twajonasile), soni pamasile pakuonechele kukwenu (konasika kwao) kuumila m’malo mwao muwatamaga (mwamusyuchile kuwa m’masame). Soni shetani ni jwasalalichisye wanganyao itendo yao (yangalumbana), basi ni jwasiwilile wanganyao kwitala (lyagoloka) namuno kuti waliji wakulolechesya (pakutenda ichindu)
